Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.components

Class LightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.render3d.components.LightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class LightComponent
extends Object
implements Component
    Represents the light component.

    You can use this class to define light attributes for a 3D scene.

    Since:
    3

      • isShadowEnabled

        public boolean isShadowEnabled​()
        Checks whether the current lights support projection.
        Returns:
        Returns true if projection is supported; returns false otherwise.

      • setShadowEnabled

        public void setShadowEnabled​(boolean isShadowEnabled)
        Sets whether the current lights support projection.
        Parameters:
        isShadowEnabled - Specifies whether the current lights support projection. true indicates that projection is supported, and false indicates the opposite.
